title.ja: "Oppai Momitai" tte Sakendara, Imouto no Tomodachi to Tsukiau Koto ni Narimashita.

altTitles.ja: 『おっぱい揉みたい』って叫んだら、妹の友達と付き合うことになりました

altTitles.en: When I Shouted "I Want to Fondle Boobs!" I Decided to Go Out with My Sister's Friend
When I Yelled, "I Want to Play with Some Boobs!", I Ended up Going Out with My Sister's Friend

altTitles.ko: 방법 : 인적이 드문 곳에 가서 큰 소리로 "젖 주무르고 싶어!!!!" 라고 큰 소리로 외칩니다.

altTitles.zh: 大声喊「我想揉欧派」，结果和妹妹的朋友成为恋人了。

altTitles.zh-hk: 大聲喊「我想揉歐派」，結果和妹妹的朋友成為戀人了。

altTitles.pt-br: ''Eu Quero Acariciar Peitos!'' E Decidi Sair Com A Amiga Da Minha Irmã

altTitles.es: Empecé a salir con la amiga de mi hermana después de gritar: “Quiero tocar pechos”

description.en: "I want to fondle boobs!" His prayer was answered by an angelic girl named Miko-chan. "I-if I let you touch my breast, will you go out with me?" It's a sweet story of their daily lovey-dovey life. Isn't it wonderful to have a girlfriend?
description.id:
Ketika aku berteriak mengeluh ingin meremas dada, teman adikku menjadi pacarku.

“Aku ingin meremas dada!!!”
Jawaban dari permintaannya tersebut adalah gadis malaikat bernam Miko-chan.
“Jika aku mengizinkanmu menyentuh dadaku, maukah kau pacaran denganku?”

Ini adalah kisah komedi romantis keseharian pasangan penuh mesrah yang diawali laki-laki yang ingin meremas dada, dan perempuan yang mengizinkan dia untuk meremasnya.
description.ja: 「おっぱい揉みた～～～い!!!」「お、おっぱい揉ませたら、私と付き合ってくれますか…？」人畜無害な高校生、傘井夏彦に初めての彼女ができました。
description.pt-br:
'Eu quero acariciar seios!' 

Sua oração foi atendida por uma garota angelical chamada Miko-chan. 

'E se eu deixar você tocar nos meus seios, você vai sair comigo?' 

É uma doce história de sua vida diária de pombinhos amorosos. Não é maravilhoso ter uma namorada?
